item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:6, topic:181006”]Centered fo sho.

I cried when there weren’t rollovers on the links… and the links are images? How is it a template if the links are images? It’s an unusable template methinks. You can just put shadow on text with javascript.[/quote]
You can change the link texts on the PSD
But yeah, I’m fixing the rollovers tonight!

When you say centered, what do you mean guys?
Do you mean I should center the content, or the actual layout? because on my copter the layout is centered. Not sure for other people though :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2008, 06:14:35 PM[/size][hr]I’ve just updated the thread intirely. Can people please post wish help, adive, tests and feedback!

Anything I can use to develop this further ;D
